synopsis.text: It's the Christmas season and Princess Dejiko of planet Di Gi Charat receives an invitation for herself and her friends to a festive cruise. Though a chance to celebrate the holidays, mischief lurks as the invitation comes from Dejiko's nemesis Princess Piyoko. With capturing Dejiko as her goal, Piyoko chases after her rival on the cruise ship causing chaos. Dejiko's friend Usada aims to bake a Christmas cake amidst the ruckus, hoping for a peaceful holiday celebration. Though Piyoko intends to ruin the festivities, Dejiko strives to thwart her plans and bring Christmas joy. This yuletide special promises excitement and holiday spirit as Dejiko faces misbehaving villains determined to steal the show.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
